# criblio_search_macro (Resource)

SearchMacro Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "criblio_search_macro" "my_searchmacro" {
  created     = 0.82
  created_by  = "...my_created_by..."
  description = "...my_description..."
  id          = "...my_id..."
  modified    = 8.62
  replacement = "...my_replacement..."
  tags        = "...my_tags..."
}
```
